nav.div: North Penn School District » Our District » District Communications and News » Announcements » COVID-19 School Closure Announcement

span.strong: All NPSD schools are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. School and district offices are closed until further notice.

br.br: Please visit our COVID-19 School Closure Resources Website for all information regarding the COVID-19 school closure.

div.p: NPSD is committed to ensuring that all material on its website is accessible to students, faculty, staff and the general public. If you experience difficulty with the accessibility of any web pages or documents, please request materials in an alternate format.
